title: Ranked error or what ?????????????
body: Usually we have to complete 10 matches then we will have a rank in LOL but why i completed 4 matches i had a rank . By the way all 4 matches lost and i had iron IV. Why ??????????I thought we have to complete 10 matches . Can anyone explain pls???????????

replies.body: The new provisionals will give you a minimum rank after your first game played. This is the lowest your rank can be once you are properly placed, so it'll only go up from there.  Only you can see this rank, it isn't public on your profile until you complete all 10 matches.
but usually we can see how many match we have to complete but in this case i can't see that. Its like i have finished 10 matches but in fact that i have not. So weird !!!!!!!!!!!!
